amendment.description: To extend the prohibition on commercial export of certain munitions to the Hong Kong Police Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2251 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2251 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4188) To extend the prohibition on commercial export of certain munitions to the Hong Kong Police Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2251 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2251 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
